mapper.sql: a.MODEL_GROUP_ID, a.MODEL_GROUP_NAME, a.MODEL_GROUP_CODE, a.MODEL_GROUP_DESC, a.CREATE_PERSON, a.UPDATE_PERSON, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CRE_RULE_DETAIL WHERE MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_DEL = '0'

SELECT
FROM CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP a -- left join CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP_CHANNEL b on a.MODEL_GROUP_ID = b.MODEL_GROUP_ID WHERE 1=1
and a.MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.MODEL_GROUP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{modelGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and a.CREATE_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.CREATE_DATE <= to_date(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY a.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT
FROM CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP a left join CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP_CHANNEL b on a.MODEL_GROUP_ID = b.MODEL_GROUP_ID WHERE 1=1
and a.MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.MODEL_GROUP_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{modelGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and b.CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.CREATE_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.CREATE_DATE <= to_date(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY a.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP
MODEL_GROUP_ID,
MODEL_GROUP_NAME,
MODEL_GROUP_CODE,
MODEL_GROUP_DESC,
CREATE_PERSON,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_PERSON,
UPDATE_DATE,
#{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelGroupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP
MODEL_GROUP_NAME = #{modelGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_GROUP_CODE = #{modelGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_GROUP_DESC = #{modelGroupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.CHANNEL_ID, a.CHANNEL_NAME from CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP_CHANNEL b left join CRE_AUTH_CHANNEL a on a.CHANNEL_ID = b.CHANNEL_ID where b.MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select MODEL_GROUP_ID, MODEL_GROUP_NAME, MODEL_GROUP_CODE,MODEL_GROUP_DESC,CREATE_DATE,CREATE_PERSON,UPDATE_DATE,UPDATE_PERSON from CRE_PUB_MODEL_GROUP where MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select RULE_ID as ruleId, MODULE_NAME as ruleName, RULE_DESC as ruleDesc, RULE_TYPE as ruleType, RULE_NAME as ruleVerId from CRE_RULE_DETAIL where IS_HEADER = '1' and MODEL_GROUP_ID = #{modelGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FOLDER_ID = '0000000000000000000000000000001' order by UPDATE_DATE desc
select RULE_NAME as ruleName, RULE_STATUS as ruleStatus from CRE_RULE_DETAIL where RULE_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_HEADER = '1'

SELECT RULE_ID as ruleId, VERSION as version FROM CRE_RULE_DETAIL WHERE IS_DEL = '0' AND IS_HEADER = '0' AND RULE_NAME = #{RULENAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY to_number(VERSION) DESC ,VERSION_CREATE_DATE DESC

select c.RULE_SET_GROUP_NAME as ruleSetGroupName, b.RULE_SET_NAME as ruleSetName, b.RULE_SET_HEADER_DESC as ruleSetDesc, a.VERSION as version from CRE_PUB_RULE_SET a left join CRE_PUB_RULE_SET_HEADER b on a.RULE_SET_HEADER_ID = b.RULE_SET_HEADER_ID left join CRE_PUB_RULE_SET_GROUP c on b.RULE_SET_GROUP_ID = c.RULE_SET_GROUP_ID left join CRE_PUB_RULE_SET_RULE d on a.RULE_SET_ID = d.RULE_SET_ID where d.RULE_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
